title: Introducing: Kelsy Karter
body:
Super soulful vocal and really high energy songwriting from **Kelsy Karter** on her latest offering, _Out Of Drugs_.

There’s a strikingly confident swagger to her sound that’s found relatively rarely and suggests far more to come from the young singer – whilst the production suggests almost ballad territory, lyrically it’s an ode to 21st century love.  Check out Out of Drugs below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
